Amanda Tea: I'm going to High Tea with my nieces. I need a mask that will make them laugh, and looks very pretty. Bonus points if its animal themed, they love cats!
Francis Lyon: I'm going to Spain for the running of the bulls! I want to be a masked hero! Make me mysterious and manly! And make those bulls think twice about chasing me!

Amanda Tea: Meow! Wonderful! My nieces are going to love it so much! I'll bring them here for their birthdays to buy their own masks!
Francis Lyon: ¡Maravilloso! The beast this year will me ME! Hahahaha!

Amanda Tea: Wow! Good job, I'm going to look great at high tea! The only thing more flashy than me will be the macarons!
Francis Lyon: Roar! I'll be the campeón with this mask!

Amanda Tea: Very nice, I'll be happy to wear it to tea.
Francis Lyon: Ok! They might recognize me, but at least I'll look good wearing it.

Amanda Tea: Well... I can probably find a hat to make it work.
Francis Lyon: I need something before my flight, so I'll take this one.

Amanda Tea: Hmmm. At least no one will be able to recognize me when I wear it...
Francis Lyon: Sure, I'll take it, but I'm going to leave it for the bulls.
